# Bechdel dataset

The bechdel dataset contains more movies that fail the test than pass, Figure \@ref(fig:bechdel-binary-bar-chart).

```{r bechdel-binary-bar-chart, fig.cap="fivethirty::bechdel contains more movies that fail the test"}
library("tidyverse")
library("fivethirtyeight")
bechdel %>% 
  count(binary) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = n,
             y = binary)) +
  geom_col()
```
